version_description:
• Brand new Survival level added!
• Now you'll get a reward if your friends click on the achievement you shared on Facebook!
• One special level added! The goal is to stay alive as long as you can, fighting off endless hordes of enemies. After sever

• Brand new Survival level added!
• Now you'll get a reward if your friends click on the achievement you shared on Facebook!
• One special level added! The goal is to stay alive as long as you can, fighting off endless hordes of enemies. After sever

• Introducing new Draft mode: build your own set of random cards and try them out against various monsters! The longer you last, the bigger your reward!
• "Play" button has been added to the Leaderboards: now you can compete with your friends more easi

• "Play" button has been added to the Leaderboards: now you can compete with your friends more easi

- New Year theme disabled.
- Minor performance improvements.
